headline: Is PepsiCo (PEP) Attractively Priced After Strong Recent Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether PepsiCo's current share price reflects its true worth, it helps to step back and look at what the recent numbers and valuation checks are actually saying. PepsiCo recently closed at US$167.48, with returns of 12.6% over 7 days, 20.5% over 30 days, 17.8% year to date, 19.8% over 1 year, 7.0% over 3 years and 44.8% over 5 years. These figures may catch the eye of investors thinking about growth potential or shifting risk perceptions. Recent news coverage has...
